scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:db: tsc config/config.ts --outDir dist/ && cd db && tsc
scripts.migrations: npm run build:db && npx sequelize db:migrate --env production --config dist/config/config.js --migrations-path dist/migrations
scripts.seeders: npm run build:db && npx sequelize db:seed:all --env production --config dist/config/config.js --seeders-path dist/seeders
scripts.start: npm run migrations && npm run seeders && node dist/server.js
